spec_data.Name: ghc-language-c
spec_data.Description:
Language C is a Haskell library for the analysis and generation of C
code. It features a complete, well tested parser and pretty printer
for all of C99 and a large set of GNU extensions.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 03:02:21 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Analysis and generation of C code
